mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM PumaTask p left join PumaTaskDb td on tb.taskId = p.id left join SrcDb d on tb.dbId = d.id where d.Name = #{name}
SELECT p.* FROM PumaTask p left join PumaTaskServer ts on ts.taskId = p.id left join PumaServer s on ts.serverId = s.id where s.Name = #{name}
mapper.update: update PumaTask set Name=#{name}, PreservedDay=#{preservedDay}, BinlogInfo_ServerId=#{binlogInfo.serverId}, BinlogInfo_BinlogFile=#{binlogInfo.binlogFile}, BinlogInfo_BinlogPosition=#{binlogInfo.binlogPosition}, ActionController=#{actionController}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime} where Id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into PumaTask ( Name, PreservedDay, BinlogInfo_ServerId, BinlogInfo_BinlogFile, BinlogInfo_BinlogPosition, ActionController, UpdateTime ) values ( #{name}, #{preservedDay}, #{binlogInfo.serverId}, #{binlogInfo.binlogFile}, #{binlogInfo.binlogPosition}, #{actionController}, #{updateTime} )
